name: Build Code Snippet Generator MVP
description: A web app that generates code snippets from natural language descriptions

steps.name: Create Base Application
steps.prompt: Create a modern web application called 'SnippetForge' with React frontend and FastAPI backend. Users should be able to describe what code they need in plain English, select a programming language, and get a working code snippet. Include a beautiful dark theme UI with syntax highlighting.

objective.task: Implement the core snippet generation engine that can create code for common programming tasks like validation, sorting, API calls, and data processing. Support Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript initially.
Enhance the snippet generator with context awareness. It should understand variations in how users describe tasks and generate appropriate code. Add examples and test cases for each snippet.
constraints: Provide multiple implementation options when relevant
Include usage examples with each snippet

objective.task: Create a stunning, professional UI with smooth animations, real-time syntax highlighting, one-click copy functionality, and share buttons. Add deployment configuration for Vercel/Netlify.
